body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If this may be security issue, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug
> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
> /kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
`make verify` reports following errors-

**What you expected to happen**:
This is the required fix reported by PR #62895 processing.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
run `make verify` from k8s source.

**Anything else we need to know?**:
Detailed list of ERRORS reported by `make verify`
```
========================
FAILED TESTS
========================
hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-gofmt.sh
hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-golint.sh
hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-govet.sh
make: *** [verify] Error 1
=======================
```
```
Verifying verify-gofmt.sh

+++ Running case: verify.gofmt
+++ working dir: /Users/mayank.gaikwad/work/go-workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
+++ command: bash "hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-gofmt.sh"
diff -u ./staging/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen/generators/client_generator.go.orig ./staging/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen/generators/client_generator.go
--- ./staging/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen/generators/client_generator.go.orig	2018-04-24 11:34:26.000000000 +0530
+++ ./staging/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen/generators/client_generator.go	2018-04-24 11:34:26.000000000 +0530
@@ -44,10 +44,10 @@

 	publicNamer := &ExceptionNamer{
 		Exceptions: map[string]string{
-			// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
-			// you can put your fully qualified package like
-			// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
-			// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "EventResource"
+		// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
+		// you can put your fully qualified package like
+		// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
+		// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "EventResource"
 		},
 		KeyFunc: func(t *types.Type) string {
 			return t.Name.Package + "." + t.Name.Name
@@ -56,10 +56,10 @@
 	}
 	privateNamer := &ExceptionNamer{
 		Exceptions: map[string]string{
-			// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
-			// you can put your fully qualified package like
-			// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
-			// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "eventResource"
+		// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
+		// you can put your fully qualified package like
+		// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
+		// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "eventResource"
 		},
 		KeyFunc: func(t *types.Type) string {
 			return t.Name.Package + "." + t.Name.Name
@@ -68,10 +68,10 @@
 	}
 	publicPluralNamer := &ExceptionNamer{
 		Exceptions: map[string]string{
-			// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
-			// you can put your fully qualified package like
-			// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
-			// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "EventResource"
+		// these exceptions are used to deconflict the generated code
+		// you can put your fully qualified package like
+		// to generate a name that doesn't conflict with your group.
+		// "k8s.io/apis/events/v1beta1.Event": "EventResource"
 		},
 		KeyFunc: func(t *types.Type) string {
 			return t.Name.Package + "." + t.Name.Name
diff -u ./pkg/security/podsecuritypolicy/provider_test.go.orig ./pkg/security/podsecuritypolicy/provider_test.go
--- ./pkg/security/podsecuritypolicy/provider_test.go.orig	2018-04-24 11:34:32.000000000 +0530
+++ ./pkg/security/podsecuritypolicy/provider_test.go	2018-04-24 11:34:32.000000000 +0530
@@ -1017,7 +1017,7 @@
 		},
 		Spec: api.PodSpec{
 			SecurityContext: &api.PodSecurityContext{
-				// fill in for test cases
+			// fill in for test cases
 			},
 			Containers: []api.Container{
 				{
@@ -1041,7 +1041,7 @@
 		},
 		Spec: v1.PodSpec{
 			SecurityContext: &v1.PodSecurityContext{
-				// fill in for test cases
+			// fill in for test cases
 			},
 			Containers: []v1.Container{
 				{
diff -u ./pkg/controller/serviceaccount/tokens_controller_test.go.orig ./pkg/controller/serviceaccount/tokens_controller_test.go
--- ./pkg/controller/serviceaccount/tokens_controller_test.go.orig	2018-04-24 11:34:33.000000000 +0530
+++ ./pkg/controller/serviceaccount/tokens_controller_test.go	2018-04-24 11:34:33.000000000 +0530
@@ -474,7 +474,7 @@

 			AddedSecret:     serviceAccountTokenSecretWithNamespaceData([]byte("custom")),
 			ExpectedActions: []core.Action{
-				// no update is performed... the custom namespace is preserved
+			// no update is performed... the custom namespace is preserved
 			},
 		},

@@ -539,7 +539,7 @@

 			UpdatedSecret:   serviceAccountTokenSecretWithNamespaceData([]byte("custom")),
 			ExpectedActions: []core.Action{
-				// no update is performed... the custom namespace is preserved
+			// no update is performed... the custom namespace is preserved
 			},
 		},

diff -u ./pkg/kubectl/cmd/config/create_authinfo_test.go.orig ./pkg/kubectl/cmd/config/create_authinfo_test.go
--- ./pkg/kubectl/cmd/config/create_authinfo_test.go.orig	2018-04-24 11:34:35.000000000 +0530
+++ ./pkg/kubectl/cmd/config/create_authinfo_test.go	2018-04-24 11:34:35.000000000 +0530
@@ -142,7 +142,7 @@
 		},
 		{
 			flags: []string{
-				// No name for authinfo provided.
+			// No name for authinfo provided.
 			},
 			wantCompleteErr: true,
 		},

Run ./hack/update-gofmt.sh
+++ exit code: 1
+++ error: 1
FAILED   verify-gofmt.sh	16s
Verifying verify-golint.sh

+++ Running case: verify.golint
+++ working dir: /Users/mayank.gaikwad/work/go-workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
+++ command: bash "hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-golint.sh"
Errors from golint:
kubernetes/cluster/images/etcd-version-monitor/etcd-version-monitor.go:71:1: comment on exported type EtcdVersion should be of the form "EtcdVersion ..." (with optional leading article)
kubernetes/cluster/images/etcd-version-monitor/etcd-version-monitor.go:135:1: comment on exported type GRPCRequestLabels should be of the form "GRPCRequestLabels ..." (with optional leading article)
kubernetes/examples/guestbook-go/main.go:35:1: exported function ListRangeHandler should have comment or be unexported
kubernetes/examples/guestbook-go/main.go:43:1: exported function ListPushHandler should have comment or be unexported
kubernetes/examples/guestbook-go/main.go:51:1: exported function InfoHandler should have comment or be unexported
kubernetes/examples/guestbook-go/main.go:56:1: exported function EnvHandler should have comment or be unexported
kubernetes/examples/guestbook-go/main.go:69:1: exported function HandleError should have comment or be unexported
pkg/kubelet/certificate/bootstrap/bootstrap.go:126:2: redundant if ...; err != nil check, just return error instead.

Please review the above warnings. You can test via "golint" and commit the result.
If the above warnings do not make sense, you can exempt this package from golint
checking by adding it to hack/.golint_failures (if your reviewer is okay with it).

+++ exit code: 1
+++ error: 1
FAILED   verify-golint.sh	190s
Verifying verify-govet.sh

+++ Running case: verify.govet
+++ working dir: /Users/mayank.gaikwad/work/go-workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
+++ command: bash "hack/make-rules/../../hack/verify-govet.sh"
can't load package: package k8s.io/kubernetes/kubernetes/examples: code in directory /Users/mayank.gaikwad/work/go-workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/kubernetes/examples expects import "k8s.io/kubernetes/examples"
make[1]: *** [vet] Error 1
+++ exit code: 2
+++ error: 1
FAILED   verify-govet.sh	299s
```

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.1", GitCommit:"d4ab47518836c750f9949b9e0d387f20fb92260b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-04-13T22:27:55Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10", GitVersion:"v1.10.0", GitCommit:"fc32d2f3698e36b93322a3465f63a14e9f0eaead", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-04-10T12:46:31Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:

- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
``` macOS 10.13.4```

- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
```Darwin mayankg.local 17.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.5.0: Mon Mar  5 22:24:32 PST 2018; root:xnu-4570.51.1~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64 i386 MacBookPro11,4 Darwin```

- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Indicates an issue or PR lacks a `sig/foo` label and requires one.
labels.name: needs-sig

title: fixes on errors reported by `make verify`
